short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The addon is designed to manage IP addresses purchased on the Proxy-IPv4 service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is designed for use by Proxy-IPV4 clients. Offering a wide range of anonymous browsing features.
- Use of various user-agents.
- Language replacement in requests according to the proxy country.
- Time zone replacement according to the proxy country.
- Option to use proxies for specific sites.
